attributes.comment:
I think the price increase is outrageous. The increase in prices , along with the
fact that the green card process takes forever.. I say this because I am a legal
immigrant and have been waiting and stuck in the green card process for more
than 4 years. This makes people or companies less tempted to be in the united
states and outsourcing will become more popular. The prices on H1 visa
processing have increased and now this. It is probably more expensive than any
other country that I know of and at the end of the day I wonder why to pay such a
huge price , with no peace of mind as the process seems to be in a limbo. I
cannot change jobs, cannot take permanent offers and my family life suffers.With
companies having to put so much money in H1 processing and green card , they
might find outsourcing a better option. The company I worked for did not want to
hire any people on H1 B and Green card and then after 6 years they had only
consultants working which were people on H1 visas. As they are not able to find
the people with the skill sets they required that were US citizens or green card
holders they have now decided to start doing H1 visa as that would save them
millons and millions of dollars. But if the costs of the visas keep increasing they
might just decide to outsource the jobs to other countries where it is a lot
cheaper. The process of outsourcing has already begun on a small scale and it
has been working fine.Also folks like me , after spending around 7 years and still
waiting to get a green card, and with all the uncertanities of how long the process
will take find the process and the price raise exploiting.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
